name: Nightclub Royale: Let's Party!
description:
Run your nightclub and collect Epic and Legendary DJ and Dancer cards to lure in guests. Hire bodyguards, choose banger songs, mix cocktails, and resolve any sudden disturbances. Even if you start in small venues, tactical skills and economical savvy will take you to the top of the night owl scene and on your way to building your own Nightclub Empire.

Features

- Business Tycoon:
Operate a nightclub and forge your very own business empire! Use cash to gain control over the entire city's night scene, one step at a time. Expand into a chain of clubs and go global.

- Employee Hiring:
Whether it's a sexy, charming young woman or a club-rocking DJ, the choice is entirely up to you. Hire these legendary late-night performers to improve your club!

- Strategic Management:
Of course, you've got to have a strategy for expanding your business. Each character has their own unique skills. Strategically deploy DJs, dancers, and bartenders to satisfy customers while raking in huge profits!

- Territory Expansion:
Use various methods to ruin the business of competitors, like sending people to cause trouble or hiring away their dancers. Drive your competitors into bankruptcy, or buy them up and get them under your thumb.

- Cater to VIPs:
VIPs and celebs can be demanding, but if you want their influence to make your club popular, you'll have to satisfy their every request.

- Different Cities:
Miami, Ibiza, Seoul, and Dubai! Provide premium fun to nightclub enthusiasts worldwide!

PLEASE NOTE! Nightclub is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your store. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download.

Want to become a member of our nightclub? If you have any questions, issues, or suggestions, please contact us via the following:


nightclubsupport@onefun.ink
https://www.facebook.com/Nightclubsimulator
